# 6.1
p_1(x) = 0.3 0.1 0.025 0.3 .125 .15
.3+.1+.025+.3+.125+.15=1
p_2(y) = .1 .55 .35
.1+.55+.35=1
.05/.1=0.5
.025/.1=0.25
.025/.1=0.25
.05/.1+.025/.1+.025/.1=1
.2/.55=0.363636
.05/.55=0.090909
.3/.55=0.545455
.1/.35=0.285714
.1/.35=0.285714
.15/.35=0.428571
0/.3=0
.2/.3=0.666667
.1/.3=0.333333
.05/.1=0.5
.05/.1=0.5
0/.1=0
.025/.025=1
0/.025=0
0/.025=0
0/.3=0
.3/.3=1
0/.3=0
.025/.125=0.2
0/.125=0
.1/.125=0.8
0/.15=0
0/.15=0
.15/.15=1

# 6.3
3A 2B 1C 3D 1E
p(0,0) = (4!/(2!*2!))/(10!/(8!*2!))=0.133333
p(0,1) = 1*4/(10!/(8!*2!))=0.088889
p(0,2) = 0
p(1,0) = 4*4/(10!/(8!*2!))=0.355556
p(1,1) = (4+4)/(10!/(8!*2!))=0.177778
p(1,2) = 1/(10!/(8!*2!))=0.022222
p(2,0) = (4!/(2!*2!))/(10!/(8!*2!))=0.133333
p(2,1) = 4/(10!/(8!*2!))=0.088889
p(2,2) = 0
p(x=0) = 0.133333+0.088889=0.222222
p(x=1) = 0.355556+0.177778+0.022222=0.555556
p(x=2) = 0.133333+0.088889=0.222222
p(y=0) = 0.133333+0.355556+0.133333=0.622222
p(y=1) = 0.088889+0.177778+0.088889=0.355556
p(y=2) = 0.022222=0.022222
1/(10!/(8!*2!))

# 6.5
p_2(y|x)

p(x=1) = 1/3
p(x=2) = 1/3
p(x=3) = 1/3

p(1,30) = .06*1/3=0.02
p(1,40) = .24*1/3=0.08
p(1,50) = .24*1/3=0.08
p(1,50) = .46*1/3=0.153333
p(2,30) = .10*1/3=0.033333
p(2,40) = .24*1/3=0.08
p(2,50) = .36*1/3=0.12
p(2,50) = .30*1/3=0.1
p(3,30) = .15*1/3=0.05
p(3,40) = .18*1/3=0.06
p(3,50) = .30*1/3=0.1
p(3,50) = .37*1/3=0.123333

# 6.7
p(y = 0) = .11
p(y = 1) = .25
p(y = 2) = .40
p(y = 3) = .24

p_1(x=2) = .40
p_2(0|2) = .07/.40=0.175
p_2(1|2) = .10/.40=0.25
p_2(2|2) = .15/.40=0.375
p_2(3|2) = .08/.40=0.2

# 6.15
.09*.36 + .25*.36 + .25*.36 + .25=0.4624

# 6.21
1*1/3 + 2*1/3 + 3*1/3 = 2
30*(0.02+0.033333+0.05)+40*(0.08+0.08+0.06)+50*(0.08+0.12+0.1)+60*(0.153333+0.1+0.123333)=49.49995

# 6.29
no

# 6.31
no, p(0,2) != p_1(0)*p_2(2)

# 6.33
.01/2=0.005
.02/2=0.01
.02/2=0.01
.95/2=0.475
.002/2=0.001
.002/2=0.001
.996/2=0.498

# 6.41
p_1(x=0,1,2,3,4,5) = 0.3, 0.1, 0.025, 0.3, .125, .15
p_2(y=0,1,2) = .1 .55 .35
E(X) = 0*.3+1*.1+2*.025+3*.3+4*.125+5*.15=2.3
E(Y) = 0*.1 + 1*.55 + 2*.35=1.25
E(XY) = 1*.05+3*.3+8*.1+10*.15=3.25
Cov(X, Y) = E(XY) - E(X)E(Y) = 3.25-2.3*1.25=0.375

# 6.43
E(X) = 2
E(Y) = 49.49995
E(XY) = 30*.02+40*.08+50*.08+60*.153333+2*30*.033333+80*0.08+100*.12+120*.1+90*.05+120*.06+150*.1+180*.123333=98.2999

# 6.73
mean = .4
sd   = sqrt(.24/106)=0.047583
z = (.59-.4)/.047583=3.993023
0
yes

# 6.75
mean = 293
sd = 847/sqrt(50)=119.783889
z = (550-293)/119.783889=2.145531
0.5 - 0.4842=0.0158

# 6.77
mean = 1.8
sd = .5/sqrt(20)=0.111803
z = (1.85-1.8)/0.111803=0.447215
0.5 - 0.1736=0.3264
(1.72+2.50+2.16+2.13+1.06+2.24+2.31+2.03+1.09+1.40+2.57+2.64+1.26+2.05+1.19+2.13+1.27+1.51+2.41+1.95)/20=1.881
(1.881-1.8)/0.111803=0.724489

# 6.79
mean = 105.3
sd = 8/sqrt(64) = 1
z = (103-105.3)/1=-2.3
0.5 - 0.4788=0.0212, no

# 6.81
mean = 60
sd = sqrt(1*60^2/100)=6
normal distribution
z = (60-30)/6=5
0

# 6.83
mean = 200
sd = 55
n = 45
45*200=9000
45*55^2=136125
(10000 - 9000)/sqrt(136125)=2.710385
0.5 - 0.4966=0.0034

# 6.87
no, yes, yes

# 6.89
300*.6=180
sqrt(300*.6*.4)=8.485281
(100-180)/8.485281=-9.428091
0

# 6.91
65*.25=16.25
sqrt(65*.25*.75)=3.49106
(20-.5-16.25)/3.49106=0.930949
0.5 - 0.3238=0.1762

# 6.93
.92
1000*.92=920
sqrt(1000*.92*.08)=8.579044
(900-.5-920)/8.579044=-2.389544
0.5 - 0.4916=0.0084

# 6.99
